query:
UPDATE case_studies SET 
  title = 'Connectivity Upgrade for 32 Bed Birmingham Property',
  challenge = 'The property at 1256 Pershore Road, a 32-bed accommodation facility in Birmingham, required a complete, high-performance technology infrastructure. The challenge was multifaceted: needing reliable, fast connectivity for all residents, robust security via CCTV and intercom systems, and a unified management solution for all these services. The client needed a partner who could manage the entire process, from initial design and planning through to final installation and ongoing maintenance, ensuring all systems worked together flawlessly from day one.; Traditional approaches often involve multiple contractors for networking, security, and access control, leading to integration issues and complex ongoing management. The client sought a single, expert provider to deliver a fully integrated, future-proof solution that would enhance resident experience and simplify property operations. The project demanded meticulous planning to ensure minimal disruption during the build phase and guaranteed performance upon opening.',
  solution = 'Umbrella Broadband engaged with the client from the earliest design stages, delivering expert consultancy to create a comprehensive technology blueprint for the entire 32-unit serviced accommodation facility. The solution covered the complete network infrastructure, incorporating high-speed fibre connectivity and enterprise-grade Wi-Fi access points to guarantee seamless, reliable internet access throughout the property for both guests and operators.

In addition to connectivity, Umbrella Broadband implemented integrated security and access control solutions designed for modern serviced accommodation environments. This included a state-of-the-art CCTV system to enhance guest safety and protect assets, alongside a contemporary intercom and access system to streamline visitor management and resident entry.

By overseeing the entire installation process—from structured cabling and hardware deployment through to commissioning and rigorous testing—Umbrella Broadband ensured full compatibility and optimal performance across the network, CCTV, and intercom systems. The project was delivered as a fully managed service, with ongoing monitoring, maintenance, and support provided 24/7. This allows the client to focus on guest experience and operational efficiency, while Umbrella Broadband ensures consistent performance, reliability, and peace of mind.',
  testimonialAuthor = 'Sunil K, Private Landlord'
WHERE id = 210002;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user sJbh4k7T5NyPGPf.root --database Fvbi7sdgjcoSVSNraU9FRD --execute UPDATE case_studies SET
